txt.en: Catch three fish from the stream just south of where Barhador is camped in the Angle of Mitheithel.
Return to Barhador with the fish
Catch three fresh fish at Barhador's recommended fishing spot in the Angle of Mitheithel.
This looks like Barhador's recommended fishing spot
Find the fishing spot Barhador described
Return to Barhador at his camp in the Angle of Mitheithel with the three fresh fish you caught.
'Oh, look at that! These are wonderful! Thank you greatly. They are so much better than carrots.'
Young Barhador made it clear that he would prefer to eat fish instead of vegetables and asked if you could catch some fish for you all to enjoy with your meal.

'Gross! I don't want carrots! If I am to grow big and strong I need more than vegetables! My mother says vegetables do make you big and strong, but I am not so sure.\n\n'Do you like fish? There is a very good fishing spot just across the road to the south, you know. Do you know how to catch one? Catch us each a fish, would you? Ivoreth won't me out of her sight. Please? I would be ever so grateful.'
